author: Warner Todd Huston, Warner Todd Huston
title: China Delays Basketball Season Due to Coronavirus
description: The Chinese government has delayed the resumption of its national basketball league and other sports, in the face of the coronavirus crisis.
content:
The Chinese government has delayed the resumption of its national basketball league and other sports, in the face of the coronavirus crisis.
The continued sidelining of the Chinese Basketball Association (CBA) is seen as a bad sign for the reopening of the N… [+1231 chars]
